      • initSqlQueries

        protected void initSqlQueries(Connection conn,
                  org.apache.mailet.MailetContext mailetContext)
                       throws Exception
        Initializes the sql query environment from the SqlResources file.
        Will look for conf/sqlResources.xml.
        Will not create the database resources, if missing
        (this task is done, if needed, in the WhiteListManager initialization routine).
        Parameters:
        conn - The connection for accessing the database
        mailetContext - The current mailet context, for finding the conf/sqlResources.xml file
        Throws:
        Exception - If any error occurs
